job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtcala makes it easy to design produce and deliver your own fullycustom fashion products and were hiring a fullstack engineer to join our team we have some incredible customers but were still a small crew youll help define our engineering team culture technology choices and roadmap and be a key part of the next phase of our growthltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtresponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtcontribute across the whole stack web ios backend services and more our tech stack is mostly typescript nodejs react react native and postgresql but we try to use the best tools to solve each problemltligtltligtwork closely with your team to solve problems plan solutions and bring them to life anything from d rendering to analytics engines youll have deep product ownership and be an important stakeholder as we plan new featuresltligtltligthelp us build the processes and tools we need to take things to the next levelltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtrequirementsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt years professional software development experienceltligtltligtstrong knowledge of javascript and web technologyltligtltligtexperience writing unit ampamp integration testsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtnice to haveltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtexperience building performant native ios appsltligtltligtexperience with typescript flow or a stronglytyped languageltligtltligtexperience with react or another componentdriven frameworkltligtltligtexperience building distributed scalable systemsltligtltligtwere a distributed team but we do have an office in nyc that youre able to work from if youre in the arealtligtltulgt
